trans-unit.source: Get Storage Account Properties
trans-unit.target: Get Storage Account Properties

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Get Storage Account Properties</languageKeyword> operation returns system properties for the specified storage account.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Get Storage Account Properties</languageKeyword> operation returns system properties for the specified storage account.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Get Storage Account Properties</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Get Storage Account Properties</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;storage-account-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;storage-account-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: GET
trans-unit.target: GET

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <userInput>2009-10-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <userInput>2009-10-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response Header
trans-unit.target: Response Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: The format of the response body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the response body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the response body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the response body.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Url
trans-unit.target: Url

trans-unit.source: Specifies the URI of the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the URI of the storage account.

trans-unit.source: ServiceName
trans-unit.target: ServiceName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the storage account.

trans-unit.source: This name is the DNS prefix name and can be used to access blobs, queues, and tables in the storage account.
trans-unit.target: This name is the DNS prefix name and can be used to access blobs, queues, and tables in the storage account.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the service name is <embeddedLabel>MyStorageAccount</embeddedLabel> you could access the blob containers by calling: http://<embeddedLabel>MyStorageAccount</embeddedLabel>.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/
trans-unit.target: For example, if the service name is <embeddedLabel>MyStorageAccount</embeddedLabel> you could access the blob containers by calling: http://<embeddedLabel>MyStorageAccount</embeddedLabel>.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/

trans-unit.source: Specifies the properties of the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the properties of the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name and value of an extended property that was added to the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name and value of an extended property that was added to the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Capability
trans-unit.target: Capability

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the storage account is able to perform virtual machine related operations.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the storage account is able to perform virtual machine related operations.

trans-unit.source: If so, this element returns a string containing PersistentVMRole.
trans-unit.target: If so, this element returns a string containing PersistentVMRole.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this element will not be present.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, this element will not be present.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Capability</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Capability</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: StorageServiceProperties
trans-unit.target: StorageServiceProperties

trans-unit.source: Specifies the properties of the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the properties of the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: A description for the storage account.
trans-unit.target: A description for the storage account.

trans-unit.source: The description can be up to 1024 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: The description can be up to 1024 characters in length.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Description</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Description</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: AffinityGroup
trans-unit.target: AffinityGroup

trans-unit.source: Required if <languageKeyword>Location</languageKeyword> is not specified.
trans-unit.target: Required if <languageKeyword>Location</languageKeyword> is not specified.

trans-unit.source: The name of an existing affinity group associated with this subscription.
trans-unit.target: The name of an existing affinity group associated with this subscription.

trans-unit.source: This name is a GUID and can be retrieved by examining the name element of the response body returned by the <legacyLink xlink:href="e2af3475-b0d0-407c-8252-6af8d1e22215" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Affinity Groups</legacyLink> operation.
trans-unit.target: This name is a GUID and can be retrieved by examining the name element of the response body returned by the <legacyLink xlink:href="e2af3475-b0d0-407c-8252-6af8d1e22215" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Affinity Groups</legacyLink> operation.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>AffinityGroup</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>AffinityGroup</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Location
trans-unit.target: Location

trans-unit.source: Required if <languageKeyword>AffinityGroup</languageKeyword> is not specified.
trans-unit.target: Required if <languageKeyword>AffinityGroup</languageKeyword> is not specified.

trans-unit.source: The location where the storage account will be created.
trans-unit.target: The location where the storage account will be created.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Location</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Location</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Label
trans-unit.target: Label

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: A name for the hosted service that is base-64 encoded.
trans-unit.target: A name for the hosted service that is base-64 encoded.

trans-unit.source: The name can be up to 100 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: The name can be up to 100 characters in length.

trans-unit.source: The name can be used identify the storage account for your tracking purposes.
trans-unit.target: The name can be used identify the storage account for your tracking purposes.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Label</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Label</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Status
trans-unit.target: Status

trans-unit.source: The status of the storage account.
trans-unit.target: The status of the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Status</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Status</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: The blob, table, queue, and file endpoints.
trans-unit.target: The blob, table, queue, and file endpoints.

trans-unit.source: Note1: The file endpoint is in preview mode and will only be returned for preview-enabled subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: Note1: The file endpoint is in preview mode and will only be returned for preview-enabled subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: Note 2: For the Standard_ZRS account type, only the blob endpoint is returned.
trans-unit.target: Note 2: For the Standard_ZRS account type, only the blob endpoint is returned.

trans-unit.source: ZRS also only supports block blobs, not page blobs, and is therefore not compatible with IaaS VMs.
trans-unit.target: ZRS also only supports block blobs, not page blobs, and is therefore not compatible with IaaS VMs.

trans-unit.source: Note 3: For the Premium_LRS account type, only the blob endpoint is returned.
trans-unit.target: Note 3: For the Premium_LRS account type, only the blob endpoint is returned.

trans-unit.source: GeoReplicationEnabled
trans-unit.target: GeoReplicationEnabled

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the data in the storage account is replicated across more than one geographic location so as to enable resilience in the face of catastrophic service loss.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the data in the storage account is replicated across more than one geographic location so as to enable resilience in the face of catastrophic service loss.

trans-unit.source: The value is <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> if geo-replication is enabled; otherwise <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: The value is <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> if geo-replication is enabled; otherwise <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>GeoReplicationEnabled</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher and is replaced by the AccountType element with version 2014-06-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>GeoReplicationEnabled</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher and is replaced by the AccountType element with version 2014-06-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: GeoPrimaryRegion
trans-unit.target: GeoPrimaryRegion

trans-unit.source: Indicates the primary geographical region in which the storage account exists at this time.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the primary geographical region in which the storage account exists at this time.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>GeoPrimaryRegion</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>GeoPrimaryRegion</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: StatusOfPrimary
trans-unit.target: StatusOfPrimary

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the primary storage region is available.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the primary storage region is available.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>StatusOfPrimary</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2013-11-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>StatusOfPrimary</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2013-11-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: LastGeoFailoverTime
trans-unit.target: LastGeoFailoverTime

trans-unit.source: A timestamp that indicates the most recent instance of a failover to the secondary region.
trans-unit.target: A timestamp that indicates the most recent instance of a failover to the secondary region.

trans-unit.source: In case of multiple failovers only the latest failover date and time maintained.
trans-unit.target: In case of multiple failovers only the latest failover date and time maintained.

trans-unit.source: The format of the returned timestamp is: [4DigitYear]-[2DigitMonth]-[2DigitDay]T[2DigitMinute]:[2DigitSecond]:[7DigitsOfPrecision]Z
trans-unit.target: The format of the returned timestamp is: [4DigitYear]-[2DigitMonth]-[2DigitDay]T[2DigitMinute]:[2DigitSecond]:[7DigitsOfPrecision]Z

trans-unit.source: For example: <LastGeoFailoverTime>2010-01-18T13:15:30.0000000Z</LastGeoFailoverTime>
trans-unit.target: For example: <LastGeoFailoverTime>2010-01-18T13:15:30.0000000Z</LastGeoFailoverTime>

trans-unit.source: LastGeoFailoverTime is not returned if there has not been an instance of a failover.
trans-unit.target: LastGeoFailoverTime is not returned if there has not been an instance of a failover.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>LastGeoFailoverTime</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>LastGeoFailoverTime</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: GeoSecondaryRegion
trans-unit.target: GeoSecondaryRegion

trans-unit.source: Indicates the geographical region in which the storage account is being replicated.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the geographical region in which the storage account is being replicated.

trans-unit.source: The GeoSecondaryRegion element is not returned if geo-replication is “off” for this account.
trans-unit.target: The GeoSecondaryRegion element is not returned if geo-replication is “off” for this account.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>GeoSecondaryRegion</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>GeoSecondaryRegion</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: StatusOfSecondary
trans-unit.target: StatusOfSecondary

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the secondary storage region is available.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the secondary storage region is available.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>StatusOfSecondary</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2013-11-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>StatusOfSecondary</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2013-11-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: CreationTime
trans-unit.target: CreationTime

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time that the storage account was created.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the time that the storage account was created.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the custom domains that are associated with the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the custom domains that are associated with the storage account.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>CustomDomains</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2013-06-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>CustomDomains</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2013-06-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: SecondaryReadEnabled
trans-unit.target: SecondaryReadEnabled

trans-unit.source: Indicates that secondary read is enabled for the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Indicates that secondary read is enabled for the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>SecondaryReadEnabled</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2013-11-01 or higher and is replaced by the AccountType element with version 2014-06-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>SecondaryReadEnabled</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2013-11-01 or higher and is replaced by the AccountType element with version 2014-06-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the secondary endpoints of the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the secondary endpoints of the storage account.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>SecondaryEndpoints</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2013-11-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>SecondaryEndpoints</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2013-11-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: AccountType
trans-unit.target: AccountType

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the account supports locally-redundant storage, geo-redundant storage, zone-redundant storage, or read access geo-redundant storage.
trans-unit.target: Specifies whether the account supports locally-redundant storage, geo-redundant storage, zone-redundant storage, or read access geo-redundant storage.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>AccountType</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-06-01 or higher and it replaces the SecondaryReadEnabled and GeoReplicationEnabled elements.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>AccountType</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-06-01 or higher and it replaces the SecondaryReadEnabled and GeoReplicationEnabled elements.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Premium_LRS</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-10-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Premium_LRS</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-10-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Endpoints
trans-unit.target: Endpoints

trans-unit.source: Specifies the endpoints of the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the endpoints of the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Endpoint
trans-unit.target: Endpoint

trans-unit.source: Contains the blob service endpoint in the following format: <codeInline>https:// %%amp;lt;storage-service-name%%amp;gt;.blob.core.windows.net</codeInline>
trans-unit.target: Contains the blob service endpoint in the following format: <codeInline>https:// %%amp;lt;storage-service-name%%amp;gt;.blob.core.windows.net</codeInline>

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Endpoint</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Endpoint</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Http endpoints, are returned with version 2014-04-01 or lower.
trans-unit.target: Http endpoints, are returned with version 2014-04-01 or lower.

trans-unit.source: Endpoint
trans-unit.target: Endpoint

trans-unit.source: Contains the queue service endpoint in the following format: <codeInline>https:// %%amp;lt;storage-service-name%%amp;gt;.queue.core.windows.net</codeInline>
trans-unit.target: Contains the queue service endpoint in the following format: <codeInline>https:// %%amp;lt;storage-service-name%%amp;gt;.queue.core.windows.net</codeInline>

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Endpoint</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Endpoint</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Http endpoints, are returned with version 2014-04-01 or lower.
trans-unit.target: Http endpoints, are returned with version 2014-04-01 or lower.

trans-unit.source: Endpoint
trans-unit.target: Endpoint

trans-unit.source: Contains the table service endpoint in the following format: <codeInline>https://%%amp;lt;storage-service-name%%amp;gt;.table.core.windows.net</codeInline>
trans-unit.target: Contains the table service endpoint in the following format: <codeInline>https://%%amp;lt;storage-service-name%%amp;gt;.table.core.windows.net</codeInline>

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Endpoint</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Endpoint</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Http endpoints, are returned with version 2014-04-01 or lower.
trans-unit.target: Http endpoints, are returned with version 2014-04-01 or lower.

trans-unit.source: Endpoint
trans-unit.target: Endpoint

trans-unit.source: Contains the file service endpoint in the following format: <codeInline>https://%%amp;lt;storage-service-name%%amp;gt;.file.core.windows.net</codeInline>
trans-unit.target: Contains the file service endpoint in the following format: <codeInline>https://%%amp;lt;storage-service-name%%amp;gt;.file.core.windows.net</codeInline>

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Endpoint</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Endpoint</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Http endpoints, are returned with version 2014-04-01 or lower.
trans-unit.target: Http endpoints, are returned with version 2014-04-01 or lower.

trans-unit.source: CustomDomains
trans-unit.target: CustomDomains

trans-unit.source: Specifies the custom domains that are associated with the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the custom domains that are associated with the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: CustomDomain
trans-unit.target: CustomDomain

trans-unit.source: Specifies information about a custom domain that is associated with the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Specifies information about a custom domain that is associated with the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the custom domain.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the custom domain.

trans-unit.target: SecondaryEndpoints

trans-unit.source: Specifies the secondary endpoints of the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the secondary endpoints of the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Endpoint
trans-unit.target: Endpoint

trans-unit.source: Contains the blob secondary service endpoint in the following format: <codeInline>https://%%amp;lt;storage-secondary-service-name%%amp;gt;.blob.core.windows.net</codeInline>
trans-unit.target: Contains the blob secondary service endpoint in the following format: <codeInline>https://%%amp;lt;storage-secondary-service-name%%amp;gt;.blob.core.windows.net</codeInline>

trans-unit.target: Http endpoints, are returned with version 2014-04-01 or lower.

trans-unit.target: Endpoint

trans-unit.source: Contains the queue service endpoint in the following format: <codeInline>https://%%amp;lt;storage-secondary-service-name%%amp;gt;.queue.core.windows.net</codeInline>
trans-unit.target: Contains the queue service endpoint in the following format: <codeInline>https://%%amp;lt;storage-secondary-service-name%%amp;gt;.queue.core.windows.net</codeInline>

trans-unit.target: Contains the table service endpoint in the following format: <codeInline>https://%%amp;lt;storage-secondary-service-name%%amp;gt;.table.core.windows.net</codeInline>

trans-unit.target: Http endpoints, are returned with version 2014-04-01 or lower.

trans-unit.source: ExtendedProperties
trans-unit.target: ExtendedProperties

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name and value of an extended property that was added to the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name and value of an extended property that was added to the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Represents the name of an extended storage account property.
trans-unit.target: Represents the name of an extended storage account property.

trans-unit.source: Each extended property must have both a defined name and value.
trans-unit.target: Each extended property must have both a defined name and value.

trans-unit.source: You can have a maximum of 50 extended property name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: You can have a maximum of 50 extended property name/value pairs.

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of the Name element is 64 characters, only alphanumeric characters and underscores are valid in the Name, and the name must start with a letter.
trans-unit.target: The maximum length of the Name element is 64 characters, only alphanumeric characters and underscores are valid in the Name, and the name must start with a letter.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use other characters, starting the Name with a non-letter character, or entering a name that is identical to that of another extended property owned by the same storage account, will result in a status code 400 (Bad Request) error.
trans-unit.target: Attempting to use other characters, starting the Name with a non-letter character, or entering a name that is identical to that of another extended property owned by the same storage account, will result in a status code 400 (Bad Request) error.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Name</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Name</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Value

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Represents the value of an extended storage account property.
trans-unit.target: Represents the value of an extended storage account property.

trans-unit.source: Each extended property must have both a defined name and value.
trans-unit.target: Each extended property must have both a defined name and value.

trans-unit.source: You can have a maximum of 50 extended property name/value pairs, and each extended property value has a maximum length of 255 characters.
trans-unit.target: You can have a maximum of 50 extended property name/value pairs, and each extended property value has a maximum length of 255 characters.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Value</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Value</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: Geo-replication can be enabled when you create or update a storage account.
trans-unit.target: Geo-replication can be enabled when you create or update a storage account.

trans-unit.source: If the <parameterReference>x-ms-version</parameterReference> is 2012-03-01 or higher and the affinity group was created in one of the deprecated <languageKeyword>Anywhere US</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>Anywhere Europe</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>Anywhere Asia</languageKeyword> regions, the <parameterReference>Location</parameterReference> element will return the location where this affinity group is allocated.
trans-unit.target: If the <parameterReference>x-ms-version</parameterReference> is 2012-03-01 or higher and the affinity group was created in one of the deprecated <languageKeyword>Anywhere US</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>Anywhere Europe</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>Anywhere Asia</languageKeyword> regions, the <parameterReference>Location</parameterReference> element will return the location where this affinity group is allocated.

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: Example

trans-unit.source: The following example program takes the subscription ID, an associated management certificate thumbprint, the operation version string, and a storage account name, and prints the returned storage account properties to the console.
trans-unit.target: The following example program takes the subscription ID, an associated management certificate thumbprint, the operation version string, and a storage account name, and prints the returned storage account properties to the console.

trans-unit.source: Initialize the <codeInline>msVersion</codeInline>, <codeInline>subscriptionId</codeInline>, <codeInline>thumbprint</codeInline> and <codeInline>serviceName</codeInline> variables with your own values to run the example code.
trans-unit.target: Initialize the <codeInline>msVersion</codeInline>, <codeInline>subscriptionId</codeInline>, <codeInline>thumbprint</codeInline> and <codeInline>serviceName</codeInline> variables with your own values to run the example code.
